text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! bahut se gumaanon se bacho, kyonki katipay gumaan gunaah hote hai. aur na toh mein pado aur na tumamen se koee kisee kee peeth peechhe ninda kare - kya tumamen se koee isako pasand karega ki vah mare hue bhaee ka maans khae? vah to tumhen apriy hogee hee. - aur allaah ka dar rakho. nishchay hee allaah tauba qabool karanevaala, atyant dayaavaan hai
